survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Hybrid Meeting Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee satisfaction with the hybrid meeting tools used in their organization, focusing on usability, functionality, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: Which hybrid meeting tools do you primarily use in your organization?
questions.client_notes: This question helps identify the most commonly used tools. Consider including an 'Other' option to capture additional tools.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the audio quality of your hybrid meeting tools?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced.
